OldSchool Library v2.0 Documentation

Introduction

Welcome to the OldSchool Library documentation. To begin, you can access the function reference by clicking on the "Modules" tab.

This page includes some tutorials that you can read before beginning. If you are a beginner, it is strongly recommended that you check the official OSLib site: http://oslib.playeradvance.org.

On this you will be able to find some simple tutorials to begin with. The documentation you are reading is designed for more advanced users.

Concepts

As said before, this documentation is not made for beginners, and you should check the official OSLib site where you will be able to find the excellent tutorials made by Yodajr, which are ideal to begin with.
